content: Would it be possible to allow bulk editing of the "resoution vote" and "vote date" fields for ballot comments? It takes so much time to fill in those fields when you have a reasonably large block vote to update. I guess you'd also need to add the ability to bulk transition to accept or reject or whatever the proposed dispo was also...
I just did a bulk editing of a bunch of Da Vinci issues and I was about to add in the vote and date to a swack of issues all at once.
What? How? It doesn't allow me to do that... Not add the vote and date.
Ok, actually it is allowing me to do that. Wow, I feel like I'm going crazy. I SWEAR I couldn't do it before.
Is there a way to bulk change the grouping and scheduling fields?
And if not, could they be added to the fields that can be edited in a bulk edit? @Lloyd McKenzie
You can bulk change them. However, the change is "replace", not "add" or "remove". I.e. if there are 3 groupings, there's no bulk change that could drop one and leave the others unchanged.
You would use the 'transition' option and the "adjust fields" or "adjust groupings" (depending on whether the issue had been resolved or not).
